subject: $59.95 Dreamweaver
body:
They are horribly tedious when they are good husbands, and abominably conceited when they are not.

A good picture is equivalent to a good deed.

The sound of laughter is like the vaulted dome of a temple of happiness.

American youth attributes much more importance to arriving at driver's license age than at voting age.

The soul without imagination is what an observatory would be without a telescope.

I learned that if you want to make it bad enough, no matter how bad it is, you can make it.

It is for each of us freely to choose whom we shall serve, and find in that obedience our freedom.

Content makes poor men rich discontentment makes rich men poor.

Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.

If all the economists were laid end to end, they would not reach a conclusion.

I like to interpose in all of my appointments, if the Lord wills.

Endless meetings, sloppy communications and red tape steal the entrepreneur's time.

Do not take life too seriously you will never get out of it alive.
